modName: Lycan Heart-A Tribute To My Friend Sandy
summary: Lycan Heart-A Tribute To My Friend Sandy
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=5][/size][/b][/font][/center][center][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]*[/size][size=6][i]Lycan Heart[/i][/size][size=5]*[/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]This is my very first mod ever and I wanted to do this for a dear friend of mine, someone who loves Skyrim as much I do, this has been a long time coming and I am so glad that I am finally able to get this mod put together to share with everyone here.
[/size][/font]


[i][font=Verdana][size=6]*INFO*[/size][/font][/i]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Race:Nord
[/size][/font][size=4]Marriageable:Yes[/size][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Voice Type:Female Commander
[/size][/font][size=4]Body:UNP-CBBE-UNPB 
Weight:*UNP set to 50 when I made this follower for Sandy she asked the weight to be 50, if enough people ask I will make a UNP 100 weight version, for now it will be 50.
*CBBE set to 100
*UNPB set to 100
Skin:Demoniac Fair Skin Option (Link to mod in credits below)
Weapon:Ebony Bow and Ebony Arrows
Class:Combat Archer
Location:Rorikstead,The Frost Fruit Inn


*[/size][font=Verdana][size=6][i]REQUIREMENTS[/i][/size][/font][size=4]*[/size]
[size=4]If you plan on using the UNPB version you will need [/size]
[size=5]+[/size][/b][size=5]Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS by [b]fore[/b] [b]+
[/b][/size][b][size=3]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?
[/size]
[size=5]+XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS by xp32+ [/size][font=Comic Sans MS]
[size=3]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?[/size]
[/font](Any skeleton of your choosing really, just make sure you have one or the mod won't work)[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]

[/size][/font][size=5]+Realistic Ragdolls and Force by dDefinder+[/size]
[size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601/?[/font]
[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS]
*[/font][font=Verdana][size=6][i]INTALLATION[/i][/size][size=4]*[/size][/font]

[/size][size=6]

[size=6]*PERMISSIONS*
